description:
Ever wish you had a handbook for how to raise a child? Pascal learns that it`s not as handy as it seems! Meanwhile, a villain gone astray learns to accept his identity, and Pascal teaches some more "correct" English.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How to Raise a Pascal Junior / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Pascal Junior no Sodatekata / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
パスカルジュニアの育て方 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
